biotools.summary: miRGTF-net is a tool for construction of miRNA-gene-TF regulatory networks using both database-level and transcriptomics/miRNomics data. miRGTF-net uses graphml format to export networks and their weakly/strongly connected components.

bioschemas.name: miRGTF-net
bioschemas.summary: miRGTF-net is a tool for construction of miRNA-gene-TF regulatory networks using both database-level and transcriptomics/miRNomics data. miRGTF-net uses graphml format to export networks and their weakly/strongly connected components.
